Utils¶

Configuration¶

Configuration utilities for cockpit.

Functions¶

configuration(label[, track_schedule, verbose])

Use pre-defined collections of quantities that should be used for tracking.

quantities_cls_for_configuration(label)

Return the quantity classes for a cockpit configuration.

Schedules¶

Convenient schedule functions.

Functions¶

linear(interval[, offset])

Creates a linear schedule that tracks when {offset + n interval | n >= 0}.

logarithmic(start, end[, steps, base, init])

Creates a logarithmic tracking schedule.
